headline: Utilities, nuclear stocks to benefit from lower rates. Here's how.
summary: US and UK officials signed a new nuclear energy agreement, titled the Atlantic Partnership for Advanced Nuclear Energy, that could streamline companies' building of new power stations across both regions. Jefferies managing director of US power, utilities, and clean energy research Paul Zimbardo illustrates the growth potential this could mean for utilities and nuclear power outside of AI use cases, namely his latest pick in Entergy (ETR). Also catch ClearView Energy Partners' Timothy Fox explain why the Nuclear Renaissance may have more momentum than ever before now. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Is There Opportunity in NextEra After Recent 12.7% Drop and Dividend Growth Outlook?
summary: If you’re eyeing NextEra Energy and wondering if now is the time to buy, you’re definitely not alone. Amid all the chatter on utilities and renewables, this stock has kept investors guessing. Sometimes it climbs, sometimes it pauses, but it always draws curiosity. Over the past week, shares have inched up 2.7%. If you zoom out to a month or more, you’ll notice a drop of 5.0% in 30 days and even a 12.7% decline in the past year. That’s not a small amount, especially when you consider the...
